channel.title: Gmod black main screen error
channel.description:
I'm going to explain my problem through the medium of poem.......nahhhhh
So my problem is that when ever I start up g mod I see the loading picture of the guy with a gravity gun and crows, but as soon as I enter the main screen all I can see is a black screen with my mouse flickering.
It makes me cry!
I have tried re-installing it and restarting steam.
Thanks...if you help, but to everyone else [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dMt0lhnlLL4[/url]

item.title: Gmod black main screen error
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Update video drivers and verify the cache.

If that doesn’t work, stop, drop and roll.

Read full topic
